website_summaries.verdict: Highest quality of tempered glass provides unmatched durability.
pros: Perfect for all ages from toddlers to adults for protecting their iPad
Being abrasion-resistant and smear-proof will add years to your tablet
cons: A very few users reported difficulty attaching it

customer_reviews.title: It is a wet-application and I like it because it will not chip or crack like ...
customer_reviews.text: This is similar to the 'ArmorSuit' I purchased for my phone. It is a wet-application and I like it because it will not chip or crack like the "gorilla-glass" type screen covers. I am still trying to get the last few micro-bubbles out, and t first I thought the skin had a yellowish tinge, but I discovered I hadn't removed the final layer of the application sheets. That was my only complaint- I do think the instructions were not complete enough to explain the removal of the last layer. I was almost going to send this back until I realized there was one more sheet to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Best Protection for iPads
customer_reviews.text: The Glass Screen protector is so much better than the standard screen protector they sell (Invisible Shield HD). I tried applying the HD shield myself and ended up failing miserably and throwing away my $30.00. I purchaed this on Amazon, received it today, and just installed it on my iPad Pro 9.7. Let me tell you that I'm next to worthless putting these things on any devices, but I was successful with the InvisibleShield Glass Screen Protector. The screen protector is THICK! I have no doubt that it will provide years of protection to my iPad and I wouldn't hesitate to purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: autocad_junkie

customer_reviews.title: Must have for iPad and iPhone!
customer_reviews.text: I think a must have if you have an iPad. Nice protection, very nice to install....My iPad ended up in the rain unfortunately after leaving it outside inadvertently. The glass protector is probably the only reason it resulted in no damage to it (it was a sprinkle, we are talking about a down pour for 3 hours)! The lifetime replacement is a nice feature and have ordered 2 replacements for my iPhone in the past 7 months - easy to order and exchange at shipping costs only....
customer_reviews.author: Sebastien Tournier

customer_reviews.title: The best sheild for you iPad or iPhone or any other device
customer_reviews.text: This iPad protective shield is exactly as advertised - crystal clear and very easy to apply. It's a little on the expensive side, but totally worth it. Unlike other protective shields, this one almost installs itself, leaving absolutely no bubbles on the screen. It was easy to handle and apply and when placed on the screen of the iPad it started to "lay itself down" over the screen. I only needed to use the cloth provided to smooth down a few places along the edges. It is important, though, that you have the iPad screen itself very clean before applying the InvisibleShield Glass.
customer_reviews.author: Bob C

customer_reviews.title: Best screen protector I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: This screen protector is super easy to apply. Make sure you clean the screen really good before applying. It feels just like the screen which is a big thing for me. This was by far the easiest screen protector I've ever applied and I've never had a problem applying one before. Have not dropped my iPad yet and hopefully don't anytime soon but this protector makes me a little more confident. This is almost half off what the retail stores are selling it for. Make sure you register it so you can warranty it out if it ever cracks or begins to peel. You can even warranty it if you screw up installing it.
customer_reviews.author: louiekaps

customer_reviews.title: Not for my iPad... But for my shoe!
customer_reviews.text: To be honest I actually did not use this for my iPad... In fact I used it to protect the bottom of my Christian louboutin shoes! Lol I was able to use one sheet for two pairs of shoes (so Kate's and lady peep). They work wonderfully and I would recommend them all the way. Just trace and cut, and nobody will notice they're there. Just be sure to be careful the first time you wear them if that's what you're using them for as well since it is slippery before it gets scuffed.
customer_reviews.author: Great Gatsby

customer_reviews.title: Great Shield
customer_reviews.text: Great protective all GLASS screen. It was very simple and easy to install. It works well with the Apple Pencil, which was my main concern. The ZAGG shield is considered the best on the market. Best Buy was selling the exact one for $49. I highly recommend this screen protector for your iPad Pro or iPad Air. Great price, as well.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market
customer_reviews.text: It's so easy. Love Zagg product for their invisible shield. It is really high grade, quality product. If you've tried their original product you either get it done professionally or do it yourself. You know how difficult the original was to place on your iPad. Overall, this is easy to do yourself. It's 100% guaranteed for the time you keep your iPad. If you found this review helpful..please click yes at the bottom of this review..Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Bing C. Dionida

customer_reviews.title: Installed easily.  An excellent screen protector.
customer_reviews.text: After all the comments about the difficulty of achieving a clean installation, free of dust and bubbles, I was quit pleasantly surprised when my installation was easy and free of any imperfections. the protector remains clear, and the amount of pressure required is no greater than without the screen protector. I am very happy with the Zagg glass screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: WilNCope

customer_reviews.title: I love Zagg screen protectors!
customer_reviews.text: This glass screen protector was worth every cent. It was very simple & easy to install. You can barley tell a screen protector is on my iPad.
customer_reviews.author: LaBellaRose

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Apply
customer_reviews.text: Follow the directions, pull the tabs firmly, and center it over the glass and lay it down upon the top of your iPad screen. You can watch it adhere itself to your screen starting from the center and flowing out in all directions. Let it go as far as it will on it's own before you start pushing out the bubbles with the cloth..
customer_reviews.author: RnEw

customer_reviews.title: They are easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: I have glass screen protectors on all of our cell phones - this is the first screen protector I've purchased for my ipad. They are easy to put on, although not always easy to put on perfectly - there is always a speck or a little piece of dog hair that gets under the screen. Well worth the protection on your screen. We have had the glass protector break on our phones, but never the phone screen.
customer_reviews.author: It's Me

customer_reviews.title: NOT Scratch-resistant tempered glass
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to protect my new IPad I received for Christmas and have been very careful with it but now this supposedly "Scratch resistant" glass has a giant scratch all over it! I have no earthly idea what caused it! And of course the return window for Amazon closed yesterday! And Zagg wants to charge $5.99 to replace it! I am VERY unhappy with this product. My old iPad had a Zagg cover that wasn't glass and more of a rubbery/plastic type coating and I am regretting not getting that product instead.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Cloud

customer_reviews.title: This product is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product and it came defective. Following the instructions the black cloth was leaving lint and dust on my screen. I was blowing it off after using cloth but it left stuff under the film. I got sent a new one applied the same way black cloth left no residue and I could not be any happier with the end results. It’s clear durable and it works perfect! Would be 5 stars had the first one not left fuzzys all over
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Best Screen Protector I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: I have had this screen protector for about 2 years now and it has worked GREAT!! It is clear as crystal and doesn't impact touchscreen performance at all. I am very careful with my iPad but this screen protector has prevented many scratches and seems to help deal with shock to a small degree. When you add their lifetime warranty to the deal, I highly recommend Zagg​ products to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Grant

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the $$ for the protection
customer_reviews.text: This is the only brand I use. I drop my stuff all the time. I have one on my ipad and iphone. I've had to replace the protectors before and it's a very simple process. Just remember to register your screen protector when you get it in the mail! Even when the Zagg is shattered, my screen is always in perfect shape.
customer_reviews.author: Marie S

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great company.
customer_reviews.text: Zagg is always my go to protector brand. I have been using Zagg for the last 8 years and have never had major issues and love their customer service. This screen protector is great, I have it on all of my kids iPads as well as my iPhones. Great product and great company!
customer_reviews.author: Codi J.

customer_reviews.title: LIFETIME GUARANTEE IS BOGUS
customer_reviews.text: Don’t believe the lifetime guarantee. After 2 years mine cracked horribly. It took many communications with the company to get a response, then it was that it was out of stock even though it was being sold on Amazon, finally they sent a replacement that was nothing like the original. The new version is messy to apply - requires using a spray on the shield to activate the adhesive - sloppy, hard to get a smooth surface - looks bad. I’ll never purchase another Zagg product based on guarantee.
customer_reviews.author: Jin Shin Jane

customer_reviews.title: They don’t install very easily and can’t be taken off and reapplied.
customer_reviews.text: Went through about 4 of them trying to install without a bubble. If you lift a corner to get out a tiny bubble, the zagg is shot. Can’t be reused.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.text: Bubbles that I couldn’t push out were gone after an hour. I barely even notice it is on my screen, and it is much nicer than any screen protector I’ve used with my phone. A must-have. I am not the most delicate with my technology and it has already saved my iPad multiple times, with no resulting cracks, breaks, or any visible signs of stress.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey

customer_reviews.title: Great screen with easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Order two for our two iPads and was impressed. Instlation was super simple. First one went on and had a few small bubbles that were easily removed. Second one completely installed itself without any bubbles. Both are literally invisible with clear, bright screens that are more resistant to smudges and fingerprints than our previous glass protective screens.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald B. MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: Love this screen
customer_reviews.text: Love this screen. It feels like there's no protective screen. The glass is smooth and wonderfully interactive. Clear image. You would think there is no screen whatsoever. I never realized that the plastic screen protectors drag a little until using the glass screen. Zagg makes wonderful screen protectors, of which this is the top. Great price, easy to apply, especially compared to the plastic ones, and is very thin, too. No issues with the glass being raised too high over the home button. Really glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Skabberdink

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit the entire screen for iPad 9.7 6th generation.
customer_reviews.text: It's on my new iPad 9.7 6th generation but it doesn't really cover the whole thing so I'm not sure how that works for being scratch proof and I'm going to try find another one and probably return it because knowing my luck that will be where it will crack.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation & amazing clarity!
customer_reviews.text: 1st of all, I can't believe how easy this was to install. I've done the wet-installation Zagg invisible shields before and those were a pain. This was quick, simple, and no bubbles! As for the screen, the clarity is amazing! It looks and feels like the normal iPad screen & hides fingerprints better. Even the edges of the shield (which is about twice the thickness as their regular shields) have a rounded edge to them so it feels nice. The only way I can even tell a shield is even on my iPad Air 2 is because the home button has a slightly deeper indentation, but I don't even mind it. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: K. Shamrell

customer_reviews.title: Its an awesome protective product for your iPad
customer_reviews.text: Its an awesome protective product for your iPad, if you already made an inversion on your tablet it's worth it to invest on a good shield to protect that glass. It's strong, clean and thin, it doesn't change the vibrant color from the screen and doesn't affect the touch on the gadget. Warning: Make sure the surface your using when applying the Glass is completely clean, once you peel off the plastic protector of the glass to expose the sticky part of it, the static charge on the plastic will attract dust and stuff to the glass, then it can get complicated to clean that off of the glass.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo Martinez

customer_reviews.title: ... of the glass edges that results in a very nice look and feel
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the Zagg Invisibleshield screen protection because (1) they fit perfectly and (2) there is a slight beveling of the glass edges that results in a very nice look and feel. Looks a little like the screen protector melts into the screen instead of leaving an edge. We applied a protector to a new Air 2 and to an older original Air that had some wear and a couple of little marred areas. The screen shield made the older one look like new. Applying the shields is not terribly easy because of the nature of dust--you've got to use care to get it clean and right the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Pink dog

customer_reviews.title: Full protection
customer_reviews.text: An expensive IPAD needs protection and this ZAGG protector does the job very well. I have used this and other ZAGG screen protectors now for many years on all my phones, watches, and other electronics. always safe than sorry.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: I Love Zagg
customer_reviews.text: I love the Zagg Screen Protectors...yes a bit more costly but they also stand behind their warranty / guarantee. I have used guarantee only once because they protector doesn't mess upbogten. I honestly have Zagg on my IPod, My Surface, our two Phones and my IPad. Good Product.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Best screen protectors ever!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love zagg products, they are the best that i have found! The first time I bought on was for my galaxy s5 in January 2014 and to this day is still on it. This was the 5th one I have purchased for my mother's ipad and she loves it. Very clear and so much easier to put on than the regular screen protectors. You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Maefield

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Kid tested
customer_reviews.text: This was my second one of these. The first got broken when my kid dropped iPad. I have to say I was skeptical about a glass screen protector but it did its job and protected the screen from getting broken exactly as designed which is why I bought another. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: bostnrulz

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful, but be prepared for a period of frustration
customer_reviews.text: It looks superb when installed, but it messes the touch interface in the first few weeks. It either double-taps when you don't expect, or misses the tap completely, or sometimes fails to notice a hold tap. Therefore, it utterly ruins game play and drives you up the wall. I used this on both my wife's and my own unit, and we've both experienced the same mis-behaviour, so it looks like it's not a one-off. The good news is that after a while it seems to start to work closer to what one expects.
customer_reviews.author: KiwiHoria

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised! Had a few pretty deep scratches on my iPad screen as I didn't have a protector before. I use an Adonit stylus that kept catching on the scratches and I had to do something about it. The glass protector does not make the scratches invisible, in fact they can be seen a little easier with it on, but the stylus no longer catches on them and there is no loss of touch sensitivity with the glass. If you use a hard stylus the glass is a must as the softer protectors dont allow it to slide as easily. Plus now I feel much safer about my iPad screen and it's daily activities.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: Fool-proof Application!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to follow instructions for a clean, bubble-free application. Product is offered at an extremely fair price (as opposed to my local office supply retailer) and provides significant protection to keep investment in iPad safe and secure.
customer_reviews.author: PatsFan

customer_reviews.title: Will never buy anything but Glass again!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Zagg's Glass Screen Protector will now be my go-to protector for all my devices. Slick-smooth surface, works great with my Apple Pencil, and the installation was amazing. Press the center, and it adheres perfectly. Only had 2 small bubbles that easily pressed out.
customer_reviews.author: Quiltgirl

customer_reviews.title: Five stars. Kept up with my craziness
customer_reviews.text: First time applying one of these screens myself. Bit of a perfectionist so I took it off and on about three or four times and then tried to wipe down the adhesive side with the cleaning towelette and the microfiber cloth. Took a while but I got it on and it looks great. All of my messing around doesn't seem to have hurt it a bit. Glad I went ahead and spent the money on this option because I'm pretty sure I could have ruined a lot of the other brands had I done the same thing to them.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Brown :)

customer_reviews.title: VERY STURDY VERY PRACTICAL EASY APPLICATION
customer_reviews.text: Great protection but the size does not cover as close to the edges as some other shields. This allows for more variation in alignment accuracy. The 2 tab method of positioning makes application easy. And the U shape home button cut out is great for fingerprint recognition. If you are looking for something that will not be seen take a look at SuperGuardZ. But remember the closer the fit the more critical the alignment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent screen protector.
customer_reviews.text: ZAGG InvisibleShield Glass Screen Protector for Apple iPad Air 2... This screen protector is perfect. It's crystal clear, responds to every touch and adds the perfect layer of protection to my iPad Air 2. The glass is so much better than the regular type ?plastic? screen protectors that I have purchased in the past, that bubble up or roll at the corners and get hazy. I've had it for 4 months and I would highly recommend it to everyone. Well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Magnetgirl

customer_reviews.title: this product is fantastic. It provides incredible protection and
customer_reviews.text: Once applied, this product is fantastic. It provides incredible protection and, according to everyone with whom I have spoken, the customer service is extraordinary if the glass ever gets nicked. Total replacement, no questions asked. For the lifetime of the product. It doesn't get better than that. The only negative -- and it's not a negative as much of an unavoidable reality -- is that it's hard to keep away microns of dust as you're applying the Zagg glass to the screen. Lots of blowing away the dust is required. But that would be true if any product. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Careful Reader

customer_reviews.title: Way better than the film screen protectors
customer_reviews.text: This shield is simply amazing. Feels like there is nothing there. No bubbles, no indentations like I had with "film" style screen protectors in the past. It even seems to resist fingerprints and smudges better than the iPad/iPhone's glass. I've gotten the InvisibleShield Glass for my iPhone 6 Plus and my iPad Air 2, and can't imagine ever going without them from now on. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: BorisTheBlade

customer_reviews.title: Take your time and you will be rewarded with the best screen protector on the market
customer_reviews.text: There is little that can be said about a perfectly clear, perfectly manufactured screen protector. The only way somebody could complain about this would be user error in applying it to the device. We made sure the screen was perfectly clear and were patient in aligning. Take your time and you will be rewarded with the best screen protector on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Klock

customer_reviews.title: Screen Protector
customer_reviews.text: This screen protector probably will do a great job of protecting the screen, but as hard as we tried to put it on without bubbles. We followed instructions exactly but it is very difficult. We decided to live with it as it should protect from damage.
customer_reviews.author: Bonita

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Zagg is absolutely the best screen protector you can get. They are smooth, resist oil, i've had one on all my devices except my watch. They do crack if you look at them wrong but the bright side is that you can request Zagg to send you a new one and they will for like 5 bucks as many times as you break it.
customer_reviews.author: Treycord

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best all-around
customer_reviews.text: I can sum this one up in 3 points: 1. The InvisibleShield Glass installation was easier and quicker than any other screen protector I have ever installed. 2. The InvisibleShield Glass is clearer than any other screen protector I have used, making the image on the iPad appear as if there is no screen protector at all. 3. The InvisibleShield Glass is thicker and more protective than anything I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Fbx_Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great for broken iPad
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to keep using our iPad after a big crack in it, and especially for it to be safe for our 5 year old. This is perfect, it makes it smooth and safe and works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.author: Leahjane

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 2018 iPad 9.7 inches!
customer_reviews.text: I love Zagg. I was wary to order this because it didn’t specifically say it would fit my iPad, but it DOES! I have the new 6th generation 2018 iPad 9.7 inches and it fit perfectly. Works very well! I bought the most expensive one.
customer_reviews.author: Katie MacGregor

customer_reviews.title: Great protection for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: We protect all our portable devices with Zagg - first, it works. Second, Zagg backs up their products. The glass screen protector is almost indistinguishable from the device screen - all the responsiveness of the original device AND protection. Wouldn't be without it.
customer_reviews.author: TN

customer_reviews.title: Very easy product to apply and provides cheap insurance for an ...
customer_reviews.text: Very easy product to apply and provides cheap insurance for an otherwise expensive device. I would highly recommend that the install video be watched twice prior to install as I've read a few reviews where this could have saved the customer time and frustration. Will look into ZAGG products for future devices.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Best by far!
customer_reviews.text: This screen protector is the best! You can't go wrong with Zagg. Super easy install, seamless, and you can't even tell it's there. I have one on my iPad and iPhone. The whole family agrees - Zagg is the brand to trust!
customer_reviews.author: JHoliday

customer_reviews.title: I only buy ZAGG
customer_reviews.text: Great screen protector. I have been a ZAGG customer since the original and have rarely been let down. In the rare cases I do have issues, ZAGG customer service is great and stands by their product with exchanges.
customer_reviews.author: JTCanon

customer_reviews.title: A heads up
customer_reviews.text: Amazon box arrived. I opened it up to find an EMPTY box with no screen protector inside! Will reorder only bc I like their product.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Be smart, buy this.
customer_reviews.text: The best you can buy. At one half the price in other places. Easy to put on if you know how to clean screen before applying. I buy for all My hand holds. Phone,iPad air, mini 4 and now for my daughter in laws iPad Air 2. She loves it. Protect your purchase with the best. And zagg is the best.
customer_reviews.author: amah

customer_reviews.title: Next Generation Technology Exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: Quite literally the most amazing screen protector I have ever used. I am super picky about fingerprints and have taken screen protectors off and bought new ones in the past for just a spec of dust under the screen. The installation with this product was perfect. I have use the HDX in the past and was skeptical that anything could surpass it, but the texture and oleophilic coating on the Glass certainly does. I'm not sure why phones and iPads just don't go ahead and make the screen with these already built in. I highly reccomend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Target had the same model for $28. Amazon had it for five dollars +4 dollars in shipping came down to nine dollars lot better than almost $30 at target. The good: awesome price, performance good, if you are an experienced screen protector applicant, otherwise you will have issues. Just reapplying more than once can be test of patience. I ended up taking the protector screen to a professional at the mall bada boom it was done in five minutes she charged me five so it was actually $14 total great product, great price, would buy it again absolutely!
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Reveles

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product and Warranty
customer_reviews.text: ZAGG synonym for excellent products and warranty definitely recommend for phones and tablets
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these over Christmas for kids new iPads and they keep the screen protected without reducing tactile feel. We have 6 other versions for our phones also so really believe in the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chadwick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution!
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a screen protector on my iPad Air. After cracking the screen in several places, the iPad was still perfectly functional. I wanted a cheap way to keep the cracks from spreading while keeping a smooth surface to use. My first impression is this does the job perfectly. Easy to install, it's like working on a new screen again. I don't have to buy a new iPad. Just as responsive as the original screen.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Used this screen protector along with an Otterbox for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this screen protector along with an Otterbox for my iPad Pro 9.7. Installed the ZAGG on my ipad and popped out the screen protector that came with the Otterbox. Fits snug and my iPad is now well protected with a crystal clear screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: Jerle B. Long

customer_reviews.title: Defective batch of screen protectors.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I love all zagg protectors. When I got it in the mail ready to put on it was not sticky on either side. I requested a replacement which was sent and the same thing. I have returned both original and replacement and was told I would have my money back in my account. I have yet to receive my money back.
customer_reviews.author: nancy goodhew

customer_reviews.title: Excellent protection and incredible, no-quesitons-asked warranty/replacement service. Very well worth the small additonal cost.
customer_reviews.text: ZAGG Glass is the only way to go. Excellent protection and incredible, no-quesitons-asked warranty/replacement service. Very well worth the small additonal cost.
customer_reviews.author: Mark 459

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Zagg makes the best screen protectors. I bought this one since I needed to replace the one that I had. I am a clumsy person and constantly drop things. However, my last screen protector lasted me a few years. Pay the extra few dollars it's worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Zagg doesn't disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Have always been a fan of Zagg for years. This one doesn't disappoint either. Unfortunately, instructions weren't sound on this one and I had a bad install. Called Zagg and they promptly sent me a replacement. Nice
customer_reviews.author: SreeK

customer_reviews.title: Protect your investment
customer_reviews.text: Never will I go without a Zagg. Looks clean, easy install, previous one cracked when I dropped my phone but its made to do that to prevent the actual screen from breaking. Easy replacement through website just pay shipping. Have used Zagg for over 6 years now and will continue into the future.
customer_reviews.author: Omaha Bagger

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding clarity with very good protection
customer_reviews.text: Great screen protector for the iPad. Easy to install and once installed you can hardly tell it's there. The Tempered glass protector is the strongest protector for the screen If you register the purchase on the Zagg website, they will provide you a lifetime warranty. If the screen ever cracks or chips Zagg will replace it for a nominal fee.
customer_reviews.author: Ray0603Top Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: and this is definitely a better option for a larger iPad screen than a film ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used the glass for about 2 months now, and this is definitely a better option for a larger iPad screen than a film product. Much easier to clean, and I don't have to worry about edges pulling up. Application was very easy, and all discernable bubbles came out quickly. Touch and feel on the screen is seemless...wouldn't even know it was there by feel and iPad touch reaction. I'm using it in conjunction with the Zagg Rugged Book Case, and there weren't any issues getting the iPad to fit into the case liner with the screen glass in place.
customer_reviews.author: Adam F.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love how much protection this glass screen protector, protects my expensive iPad from breaking?
customer_reviews.author: Shannon O. Thurman

customer_reviews.title: Only Zagg do better!!
customer_reviews.text: like any other zagg product, on protection A+, I have all my electronic protected with Zagg products, the quality and service is impecable.....always trust Zagg
customer_reviews.author: Humberto Camara

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This fits my iPad Air II perfectly. It is much easier to clean than the actual screen. It should provide some extra protection from scratches or breakage. I was a little tentative about installation, but if you are patient and careful it goes on very well. READ AND FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTIONS. DO NOT GET IN A HURRY. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: J. T. Berryman

customer_reviews.title: Zagg is always a good choice.
customer_reviews.text: This worked great on my new iPad. Installation was very easy and it worked well with the Apple pencil. I always have liked Zagg screens and this one is no exception. Great quality and fantastic lifetime warranty.
customer_reviews.author: J. Tiesman

customer_reviews.title: Very unfriendly to install and you only get 1 shot ...
customer_reviews.text: Very unfriendly to install and you only get 1 shot at it, otherwise you trashed it and lost yours money...
customer_reviews.author: speed54

customer_reviews.title: Best protector!
customer_reviews.text: Zagg, in my opinion is the best screen protectors. They offer a warranty forever, no matter how many times you crack or scratch it. You can't beat that!
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Great Screen Protector.
customer_reviews.text: amazing screen protector but very difficult to put on. I went to the mall to get it installed by a professional, it was just too big for me to try and I didn't want to throw away my money. Nevertheless once it was installed correctly, I realized that I will never try a plastic screen protector again, this is the only way to go!!! So buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Random Citizen

customer_reviews.title: ZAGG Invisible Shield Glass Screen Protector
customer_reviews.text: ZAGG Glass Shield Screen Protector is excellent and very easy to use. It took me 10 minutes to put it on my IPad Pro. No water no mess. Just clean the screen, align and it falls into place. Great Product
customer_reviews.author: Herbert

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.  You don’t even realize it’s on .
customer_reviews.text: It was the exact one I had before so that made me happy.
customer_reviews.author: wannabeskinnyrn

customer_reviews.title: Love this glass shield
customer_reviews.text: Love this glass shield! Totally protected my iPad when it fell face down off my desk onto my wood floor. Shield shattered, iPad screen was fine. Bought a replacement the same day and will buy in the future when I inevitability drop my iPad again
customer_reviews.author: lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, has lots of air bubbles
customer_reviews.text: Received product as promised, but when I tried to put this on my iPad Air2, there were a lot of air bubbles trapped underneath. I have tried several times to remove them, but to no avail. I have other ZAGG screen protectors for my iPhones and have had no problems. I am disappointed in this product and will be contacting the seller for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Bad as bad gets
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product! This thing literally feels like rubber on your screen and only serves to stop you from smudging up the screen itself. If ou use a stylus this will make it impossible and very noisy if yours has a rubber tip. Noticed slight degredation of image quality and a need for a harder touch to get a response. Trust me with how highly engineered the screens these days are you do not need something like this.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: love it! I have Invisible Shield products in all ...
customer_reviews.text: You barely can notice that the glass is placed on the iPad's screen, love it! I have Invisible Shield products in all my screen devices because I have tried a lot of brands and none of them looks and has the quality that ZAGG has plus you get lifetime warranty, I have broke my Note 5 screen protector glass twice and they have replace it on both times without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Medina

customer_reviews.title: ... for about 3 months and it is absolutely the best decision I made when getting the iPad together
customer_reviews.text: I've had the glass screen shield on for about 3 months and it is absolutely the best decision I made when getting the iPad together. It has held up exceptionally well. I've seen some people say it increases the reflectivity of the screen, this may be true but in my experience I've never noticed it being too reflective to clearly see and honestly I don't even notice it unless sitting under bright lights and the iPad screen is off. It is a great product, hopefully won't have to ever replace it but I've heard good things about zagg customer service if it ever does happen.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: great fit, the only problems was trying to put ...
customer_reviews.text: great fit, the only problems was trying to put it on without getting lint under the glass. I learned later the best to avoid that is doing the install in slightly steamed bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: drobin3

customer_reviews.title: Good good
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought Zagg products exclusively for a while now and will continue to do so. The lifetime guarantee alone makes it worth it, a process made super easy by their customer service. These products are super high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Aidan J. P.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Loved the easy instructions to follow and that it had all the cleaning supplies included. I installed int on my son’s iPad in five minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Just as described!
customer_reviews.text: I found this product easy to apply and quality to be great so far. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shoozzi

customer_reviews.title: They aren't hard to install and the warranty is great and it's super easy to get a replacement if ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had zagg before for other devices. They aren't hard to install and the warranty is great and it's super easy to get a replacement if yours gets damaged. It looks good and the texture feels fine, it works well with my stylus.
customer_reviews.author: TEB

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love the glass screen protectors! This is easy to put on, and it stays on like a champ. I use my iPad very frequently and I haven't had any trouble with it peeling or breaking at all, and you can't even tell its there. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Sclouser89

customer_reviews.title: There should be a better way to apply these things
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully I was able to get the screen protector on without any bubbles. I've put protectors on wrong before, and you just have to live with the consequences or buy another. There should be a better way to apply these things.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus O.

customer_reviews.title: Protccts a lot better than other glass protectors I have used in the past.
customer_reviews.text: Love Zagg glass protectors. Take a fair amount of abuse. Have one on my phone as well. A lot cheaowr than in the store and Zagg warrantees their products.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Norwood

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Screen protector came as advertised. It was easy to apply, just follow the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Was for my moms IPad for xmas, looks great, no complaints so far. Thank you again.

customer_reviews.title: SO EASY TO INSTALL
customer_reviews.text: EXACTLY WHAT I WAS LOOKING FOR, SO EASY TO INSTALL, DONE IN LESS THAN 5 MIN. PREV ONE HAS LASTED ME 2 YEARS. THANKS
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Soria-Cardona-Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: THIS SCREEN WORKED PERFECT ON MY IPAD WOULD HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT GOOD PRODUCT I WOULD PURCHASE FROM THIS COMPANY AGAIN
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Evatt-Gilstrap

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Protective.
customer_reviews.text: Installation was easy (no fluid to spray). It went on perfectly and fits well with my Zugu case. As always, ZAGG's lifetime warranty makes this a big value.
customer_reviews.author: Mr./Mrs. B.

customer_reviews.title: Great value and provides wonderful protection to the screen...
customer_reviews.text: The price for the screen protector was really nice and it was very easy to install on the iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Arnold J Bernat

customer_reviews.title: Screen protection
customer_reviews.text: Always get the Zagg screen savers. They are really good. The fit is great!
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Defiantly great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I've always been impressed with Zag products as well as this one. Defiantly great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Zagg Shields are awesome! They are easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Zagg Shields are awesome! They are easy to install, clarity is great, and the best part is their warranty. Simply register your shield online and if you damage it, you can make a warranty claim by paying shipping and returning your damaged shield. Worth the investment to protect the screens of your electronic devices.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Great product but you only have one shot at putting it on an iPad.
customer_reviews.text: I love zagg products but you only have one shot to get it right. I peeled it up to correct one dust speck and now there’s 10 of them. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great Screen Protector
customer_reviews.text: This works amazingly on my iPad Air 2. I would have love to see it cover underneath the touch ID but this is fairly minor for me. Ive had this screen protector on my phone and still haven't had to replace it yet. I recommend buying this over other brands.
customer_reviews.author: JonathanKyle

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Always recommend one of these, Zagg is the only brand to get.
customer_reviews.author: rebus

customer_reviews.title: Great protection for your tablet
customer_reviews.text: Great protection for your tablet. I always purchase ZAGG Glass and their products have saved my devices on more than one occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Confirmed Pin

customer_reviews.title: Works Great and Easy to Apply.
customer_reviews.text: Received in a timely manner, applied easily and and functionally works great as if it were not on my iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

product_meta.title: ZAGG InvisibleShield Glass Screen Protector for Apple iPad Pro 9.7 / iPad Air 2/ iPad Air
product_meta.description: Style:Glass - Screen| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingInvisible Shield Glass is the next evolution in premium screen protection. Made of high-quality tempered glass, It delivers maximum scratch protection while preserving crystal clear image resolution. It's so good and so strong that every glass is guaranteed for the life of the device It protects. In addition to unmatched protection, Glass maintains precise touchscreen sensitivity. It's only 0.4mm thin and features a unique oil-resistant coating that repels natural skin oils so it's always a breeze to clean. And speaking of easy, installing glass is a simple as aligning it, pressing it, and watching it magically do the rest. All in all, glass is the clear choice in screen protection.
feature_bullets: Compact & scratch protection: High quality tempered glass provides maximum impact and scratch protection.
Ultra smooth: The smooth tempered glass with beveled edges is unlike anything you've ever felt before.
Precision touch sensitivity: smooth tempered glass provides remarkable touch sensitivity and high definition clarity.
Easy, bubble-free application: smart EZ Apply tabs make application simple and accurate.
Protective: Made of fortified tempered glass, it delivers unprecedented scratch protection.
Crystal Clear: High-grade tempered glass provides ultimate clarity.
Guaranteed: Invisible Shield Glass is so good, it comes with a lifetime guarantee.
Sensitive: At only 0.4mm thin, Glass offers ultimate touchscreen sensitivity.
Ultra-Smooth: Its highly polished surface and tapered edges feel great and prevent snags when sliding devices in and out of pockets.
Clean and Simple: Its oil-resistant coating repels natural skin oils making Glass simple to keep clean and looking great.
Easy Installation: Glass features a sleek adhesive layer that goes on quickly and cleanly. Simply align it, press it, and watch as Glass does the rest.
Lifetime Guarantee: If your HDX ever gets worn or damaged, ZAGG will replace it for as long as you own your device.
